settings.title: About Lavishe
settings.subtitle: We sell cutting-edge fashion and offer a wide variety of fashion-related content, making Lavishe Wear the hub of a thriving fashion community.

settings.name: @LAVISHE_HANNAH
settings.description: Follow me for my unique take on LA vintage and oversized pieces.

settings.title: Meet the Team
settings.subtitle: Follow your favourite Insider and shop their #LWs straight from Instagram.

settings.title: Contact Us
settings.subtitle: Our values – beautiful apparel, exceptional service and deep appreciation for our customers – are the heart of our business.
settings.contact_form_subtitle: Need help? We’ve got you! For information about your order, our products, or any other questions give us a shout below.

settings.title: InPost 24/7 Lockers
settings.list:
• Return through your nearest InPost Locker in over 1,100 locations
  • Open 7 days a week 24/7
  • You can print a label from the carrier website by clicking the create return link
  • Your return will be processed in approximately 7 working days

settings.title: Delivery & Returns
settings.subtitle: See below for information about the delivery & returns options in  your country.

settings.q: What if an item is unavailable or backordered?
settings.a: While we make every effort to fulfill your order, occasionally certain items may be unavailable. We will notify you via your email confirmation if we are out of stock on an item that you have ordered. Any changes will be removed from your order total and will be reflected on your shipping invoice. Items that are backordered will be indicated in your confirmation.

settings.title: About Us
settings.text_section_1:
Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s.

It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.
settings.text_section_2:
The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.

Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default.
settings.text_section_3:
There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form.

If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text.
